# View

**Object**

A to-one or to-many relationship view from one resource object to others representing interesting associations.

## Declaration

```swift
object View
```

## Related Objects

- **View.Attributes**: Attributes representing the metadata of the view.
- **View.Meta**: Information about the request or response.
